content.1: There was a man in the land of Uz, whose name
content.2: And there were born unto him seven sons and three daughters.
content.3: His substance also was seven thousand sheep, and three thousand camels, and five hundred yoke of oxen, and five hundred she asses, and a very great household; so that this man was the greatest of all the men of the east.
content.4: And his sons went and feasted
content.5: And it was so, when the days of
content.6: Now there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the
content.10: Hast not thou made an hedge about him, and about his house, and about all that he hath on every side? thou hast blessed the work of his hands, and his substance is increased in the land.
content.11: But put forth thine hand now, and touch all that he hath, and he will curse thee to thy face.
content.13: And there was a day when his sons and his daughters
content.14: And there came a messenger unto Job, and said, The oxen were plowing, and the asses feeding beside them:
content.19: And, behold, there came a great wind from the wilderness, and smote the four corners of the house, and it fell upon the young men, and they are dead; and I only am escaped alone to tell thee.
content.20: Then Job arose, and rent his mantle, and shaved his head, and fell down upon the ground, and worshipped,
content.21: And said, Naked came I out of my mother’s womb, and naked shall I return thither: the
content.22: In all this Job sinned not, nor charged God foolishly.
